Verify the main content block has a width of 960px, is horizontally centered with left/right margins auto, and has text color #343a40
Verify the 'Last Updated' date is '2023-10-27' with font size 12px and font weight 400
Verify the 'Back to Home' link is visible, has text 'Back to Home', and color #007bff
Verify the 'Back to Home' link transitions to color #0056b3 on hover in 150ms
Verify its aria-label is 'Return to homepage'
Login to the admin panel

Verify the 'Dashboard' menu item is active, its background color is #007bff, text color is #ffffff, and font size is 16px
Verify all menu items have 15px top and bottom padding, left aligned text, and a height of 48px

On the product details page

Verify the increment/decrement buttons are enabled, have a background color #f0f0f0, text color #333333, and a border radius 2px
Verify the maximum count allowed is '99'
Verify the 'Available Stock' label's text is 'In Stock' with color #28a745 and font weight 600
Access the image gallery
Verify each thumbnail image has a source starting with 'https://www.gallery.com/thumbs/', rendered dimensions 100x75px, and a 1px solid border #e0e0e0
Verify there are exactly 12 thumbnails displayed in a grid, with 10px margin between each
Verify the main image viewer displays the clicked thumbnail at width 800px, height 600px, and its alt text accurately reflects the image content
Open the user settings page
Verify the 'Save Changes' button is disabled by default, has a background color #e9ecef, text color #6c757d, font size 16px, border 1px solid #e9ecef, and border radius 4px
Verify the 'Current Password' input field has a placeholder '******' and a width of 250px
Verify the form has 20px padding and is horizontally centered
Verify the 'Notifications' toggle is active with background rgb(40,167,69)
Open 'https://blog.example.com/article/1'
Verify the article title's text content is 'A Guide to Modern UI Testing', font size 32px, font family 'Georgia', and color #333333

Verify the author's avatar image has a circular shape (border radius 50%), source 'https://blog.example.com/authors/jane_doe.jpg', rendered dimensions 50x50px, and alt text 'Jane Doe's profile picture'
Verify the article content is left aligned with 20px padding
On the checkout page
Verify the 'Total Price' display shows '€150.00' with font size 24px, font weight 700, and color #000000
Verify the 'Proceed to Payment' button is visible, has background color #ffc107, text 'Proceed to Payment', and a 2px dashed border #e0a800
Click the 'Proceed to Payment' button
Verify it initiates a 300ms transition to a loading state where its opacity changes to 0.7, and it becomes disabled
Verify its aria-label is 'Finalize order and go to payment'
On the 'About Us' page

Verify the main hero image has source 'https://www.company.com/img/about_hero.png', is fully loaded within 1.5s, has a width of 100% of its container, height of 400px, and displays a subtle 'Company Name' watermark in the bottom right corner with opacity 0.3
Verify the 'Our Mission' heading has text size 2em, color #17a2b8, is centered, and its border bottom is 1px solid #17a2b8
Access the 'Shopping Cart' page
Verify there are 3 items listed
Verify each item has a 'Remove' button that is enabled, has a background color #dc3545, text color #ffffff, font size 14px, and border radius 3px
Verify the 'Checkout' button is visible, positioned at x 800px, y 600px, width 200px, height 45px, and its text is 'Checkout (3 items)'
Verify the entire cart summary section has 25px padding and a light gray background color #f8f8f8
Set viewport width to 360px
Verify the main navigation menu is hidden by default
Click the 'hamburger' icon (aria-label 'Open navigation menu')
Verify the menu becomes visible, occupying the full height (100% viewport height) and 80% of the viewport width, sliding in from the left with a 400ms animation
Verify its background color is #333333
Verify its items have 10px left padding
Verify its scroll position is initially at top 0
Open the 'FAQ' section

Click a question
